{detailData.map((props, index) => (

{props.name}

div.addr
{props.distance}
{props.price}
{props.photos.map((item, idx) => (
))}

{props.title}

Perfect for a 9-night stay!

Located in the real heart of krakow, this property has an exellent location score of 9.8!

))}
); }; export default Detail;
